content: row 1-4 completed the bambi scarf page 3 of 10 section 1 row 5 chain 1 turn working in bl slip_stitch in first st single_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 4 st single_crochet in next st slip_stitch in last st 8 st worked row 6 chain 1 turn working in bl slip_stitch in next 8 st work a cslst slip_stitch in next 3 st 12 st worked row 7 repeat row 5 leaving rest of row unworked 8 st worked row 8 repeat row 6 row 9- repeat row 5 and 6 across until you reach the end your last row 6 you will only work 8 slip_stitch the bambi scarf page 4 of 10 photo below section 1 complete section 2 row 1 chain 1 turn working in bl half_double_crochet in first st half_double_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st slip_stitch in next st leave rest of stitches unworked 4 st worked row 2-4 chain 1 turn working in bl slip_stitch in first st slip_stitch in next 3 st 4 st worked the bambi scarf page 5 of 10 row 5 chain 1 turn working in bl work a half_double_crochet in first st half_double_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st slip_stitch in next st work a lcslst see tutorial below slip_stitch in next 3 st leave rest of row unworked -8 st worked special stitch lcslst- insert hook in bump see photos with arrows insert hook in next bump 2nd photo at right hook inserted in 2 bumps with 3 loops on hook now working in next st from main part of work insert hook in bl see very bottom photo at left 2nd photo at very bottom right you will have 4 loops on hook yarn over and pull through all 4 loops one lcslst made note when working your lcslst you are just working in the ends of the row in the little bump at the end completed section 2 row 5 the bambi scarf page 6 of 10 section 2 row 6 chain 1 turn working in bl slip_stitch across 8 st worked row 7 chain 1 turn working in bl slip_stitch in first st single_crochet in next st work a half_double_crochet in next 4 st single_crochet in next st slip_stitch in next st work a lcslst slip_stitch in next 3 st leave rest of row unworked -12 st worked row 8 repeat row 6 8 st worked row 9- repeat row 7 and 8 across until you reach the end making sure you end on a row 7 photo of section 2 before working last row section 2 last row chain 1 turn working in bl slip_stitch in 4 st leaving rest of row unworked - 4 st worked section 3 row 1 chain 1 turn working in bl slip_stitch in first st single_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in last 2 st 4 st worked row 2 chain 1 turn working in bl slip_stitch in first st slip_stitch in next 3 st
